description: Try our easy to follow Coronation Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Grape,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coronation Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the mayonnaise, curry paste, lemon juice and half the coriander. Season with salt and pepper.
Lightly stir in the chicken, grapes and raisins. Sprinkle with the remaining coriander and serve with watercress and crusty bread.
